statements: SELECT * FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_name = 'Printer';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive';
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, estimated_cost FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE estimated_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_id, maintenance_date FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_id = 1
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, estimated_cost FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Regular'
SELECT * FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(equipment_id) AS total_equipment FROM EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, serial_number, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Annual Tune-up';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM equipment INNER JOIN maintenance_schedule ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_schedule.equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, serial_number, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM equipment INNER JOIN maintenance_schedule ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_schedule.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE serial_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT log_date, technician_name FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE technician_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type='Preventive' AND status='Pending';

SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM Equipment JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceSchedule.equipment_id WHERE MaintenanceSchedule.due_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, technician_name, notes FROM MaintenanceLog ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_interval FROM equipment ORDER BY maintenance_interval DESC;
SELECT task_name FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_due_date >= '2022-09-01' ORDER BY task_due_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_duration, maintenance_cost FROM equipment INNER JOIN maintenance_schedule ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_schedule.equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date, task_description FROM equipment LEFT JOIN maintenance_tasks ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_tasks.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_duration > 5;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_logs.log_id, maintenance_tasks.task_name FROM maintenance_logs JOIN maintenance_tasks ON maintenance_logs.task_id = maintenance_tasks.task_id;

SELECT equipment.equipment_name, maintenance_logs.maintenance_cost FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_logs ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_logs.equipment_id WHERE maintenance_logs.maintenance_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY next_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM equipment ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT maintenance_details, technician_name FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT equipment_name, SUM(maintenance_cost) AS total_maintenance_cost FROM operational_costs INNER JOIN equipment ON operational_costs.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id GROUP BY equipment_name;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT maintenance_details, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, SUM(maintenance_cost) AS total_maintenance_cost, SUM(downtime_cost) AS total_downtime_cost FROM operational_costs GROUP BY equipment_name;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, manufacturer, DATEDIFF(downtime_end, downtime_start) AS downtime_duration FROM downtime_logs ORDER BY downtime_duration DESC;
